reviews.review: Fuck you, and see you tomorrow on another lost matchmaking

How to CSGO like a pro:

Step 1: Install CSGO

Step 2: Prepare for hell

Step 3: Buy prime matchmaking

Step 4: load up Nuke on comp

Step 5: Lose all of your placements to Global Elite smurfs

Step 6: Realise you're in the trash can of Counter Strike, Silver one (like me)

Step 7: Spend $5000+ on shitty overpriced battle scarred knives and skins. (MANDATORY)

Step 8: Rank up to silver 2

Step 9: Uninstall this shitty game before going back to play it in 4 months

Step 10: Repeat until death
